title: Efficient CO2 fixation under atmospheric pressure using metal and halide-free heterogeneous catalyst
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00043A, Paper
Venkataramanan Mahalingam, Saikat Mandal, Khushboo Shivdas Paliwal, Antarip Mitra
The quest for the development of heterogeneous catalysts to synthesize cyclic carbonates from epoxides and carbon dioxide (CO2) has attracted the attention of scientists throughout the past decade. Particularly, it...
